About Me

Hello! Thank you for taking the time to visit my website. My name is Saroosh Ashraf and I am a third-year mechanical engineering student. As I progress through my years in university, I have taken a particular liking to mechanical design and infrastructure and gained a particular passionate talent in CAD modelling. I am extremely eager to learn and broaden my knowledge in the field, constantly participating in competitions and extra curricular activities. Currently, I am taking an extra curricular course called offered by the MMRI, McMaster Manufacturing Research Institute.

In my spare time, I enjoy taking on personal projects such as tinkering with 3D printing, as well as assembling Personal Computers for my friends and family. I enjoy playing the guitar as a hobby, and have a zest for travelling with my friends and family.

I hope you enjoy viewing my personal projects and experiences that I have partaken in over the years!
